item.title: FTP Server under Mac OS X
item.description: Today a colleague of mine (Thanks Alex Passfall) showed me a simple ftp server under mac: 1 2 pip2 install twisted # if not already sudo twistd -n ftp -p 21 -r Downloads After that you can access all the files in the specified directory through ftp. Awesome stuff! 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 aci-lab-as01#copy ftp://10.32.32.184/file.lic . Destination filename [file.lic]? Accessing ftp://10.32.32.184/file.lic... Loading file.
